pages.text: The mail center is located inside the Heart of Hexhaven.$(br2)Mail related items are sold here by the mod team! $(br2)Additionally, the contact central mailbox is located here, as well as a post box to send your mail.

pages.title: Mail Mods
pages.text: We use two mail mods in Hexhaven: Contact and Snailmail.$(br2)Contact allows players with no mailboxes to still receive mail.$(br2)Snailmail allows use of shared mailboxes and multiple mailboxes.
